subject: Return Order #SSN4523
description_text:
Wrong one ordered need the plus x control box 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Leon Jones,  I can see that you have already received the ProX Ultra, and at this point it’s a bit too late for us to proceed with a replacement. Perhaps we could make a few adapter cables for you instead to resolve the issue. Would that work for you?

Yes please that would be perfect.
 your definitely the best sim company out there will be buying from you guys forever. 
Sent from my iPhone

>

That be perfect thank you 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Any update on the adapters please 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Any update on the adapter please 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Any update on the adapter please 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Leon Jones,     We’ll arrange to send the replacement parts to you today. Once shipped, I’ll share the tracking number with you.
